#summary Numerical values for buttons in Android devices.
#labels Phase-Support

= Introduction =

These are the numerical values of the buttons in Android. You can use the values in the "BennuGD key code" column directly with [http://wiki.bennugd.org/index.php?title=Joy_getbutton joy_getbutton()] in Android.
The "Android key name" and "Android key code" data were extracted from the Android [http://developer.android.com/reference/android/view/KeyEvent.html docs].
